short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Finds HN comment pages for the article you're viewing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension puts a button in your menu bar that, when pressed, finds HN comments for the page you're currently viewing. The search isn't performed until you press the button, so your full browsing history isn't being collected.
